title: Super Crash UFOs

description.text: A 72h game jam made by 4 people, working remotely from 3 different countries. Collect crates of fish and deliver them to the Drop Zone, throwing them through the portal, to gain points. However, don't get to close to your "friends"....

bulletPoints: Designed UFO's power up base architecture
Programmed power ups such as Black Hole, Shield and, Boost
Implemented local multiplayer logic using Unity's New Input System
Used mathematics to create smooth abduction animation
Responsible for the Portal (drop zone) and its shader particles
